casebody.data:
NEW JERSEY THOROUGHBRED HORSEMEN'S ASSOCIATION, INC., petitioner,
v.
NATIONAL COLLEGIATE ATHLETIC ASSOCIATION, et al. No. 16-477. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 13, 2017.

Motion of Professor Ryan M. Rodenberg for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied. Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
